name: Battle Magic Jewels
description:
Battle Magic Jewels!!!
Turn yourself into warriors and improve the attribute of heroes by eliminating the jewels!
Swap by touch to drop special jewels in awesome music in fun character to complete the mission!
Swap the two stones to create at least a trio of jewels with the same symbols. Defeat all enemies by your deftness and tricks, and free the country from suffering.
Innovative gameplay with plenty of levels, magical mistery, fluent fighting with no lagging and more brand new features!
